strapiPost.title: XNA On Pace For Its Best Year After Record-Setting March
strapiPost.content:
Spring break trips packed out Northwest Arkansas National Airport last month, leading to the busiest March in the airport's nearly 25-year history and setting the pace to make 2023 a record-breaking year for XNA.

  • Big jump: A total of 80,742 passengers boarded planes at XNA in March this year, blowing well past the previous March record set in 2019 at 70,463 enplanements.
  • Growing: Nearly 84% of all seats offered by carriers were filled last month, with American Airlines flying 41,884, or 51.9%, of the travelers.

Take off with FareFlightNWA for more information HERE.
